page.title: 03POST-WAR CHIPPERFLD HOUSING
page.content: { SCATTERDELLS RESIDENTIAL LANE} A single track tarmac lane 1.5Km long ending in a footpath through woods. Contains, highly individual, mainly detached houses and bungalows set well back on their plots, sold to people returning after the war. Most have been extended or rebuilt recently.A typical home is brick-built with all modern conveniences including gas and may be using its old asbestos chalet as a garden shed or garage. {PUBLIC TRANSPORT AND COMMUNICATIONS There are very limited bus services to Watford and Hemel Hempstead so most people rely on personal motor vehicles or pushbikes to travel out of the village. Other forms of communication include a postal service and both personal and public telephones. {RURAL DEVELOPMENT}Green Belt Policy of Government stops unwanted development
